definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
lit. spring wind and rain (idiom); fig. the long-term influence of a solid education
see 紅燈區|红灯区[hong2 deng1 qu1]

sentences.english: Any indecent advertisements need to be censored.
sentences.chinese: 任何粗鄙或有伤风化的广告，应该删去。

sentences.english: The Longyan kaolin deposit in Fujian province, is of weathering residual type of altered granite.
sentences.chinese: 福建龙岩高岭土矿床是蚀变花岗岩风化残余型矿床。

sentences.english: A discussion is made on the basic concept of rock weathering, and some fuzzy cognition is clarified.
sentences.chinese: 讨论岩体风化的基本概念，澄清一些传统的模糊认识。

sentences.english: The main formation that causes water percolation into the cave is the unloading joint and the trivial cracks by weathering.
sentences.chinese: 造成洞窟渗漏水的主要构造是卸荷节理和风化微裂缝。

sentences.english: In this paper, we set forth the application of grouting in complete strong weathering rock body to the new grouting plug, its structure and working principle.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍全强风化岩体中灌浆时应用的新型灌浆栓塞。

sentences.english: The weathering layer is an obvious index for sedimentary discontinuity and change of environment.
sentences.chinese: 风化层是沉积间断和环境变迁的明显标志。

sentences.english: Weathering, Karst Landscapes, and Mass Movement.
sentences.chinese: 风化，岩溶景观和群众运动。

sentences.english: The weathering could split the rock off.
sentences.chinese: 风化可把岩石一片片地剥落掉。

sentences.english: Through a long period of weathering.
sentences.chinese: 经过长年风化，斑斑点点的。

sentences.english: Their mineral weathering degree is relatively low and the clay minerals are mainly composed of illite, chlorite and kaolinite.
sentences.chinese: 矿物风化度低，粘土矿物组成以伊利石，绿泥石为主。

sentences.english: A curtain of rain, like the embodiment of the bead curtain wind for gas filling of things.
sentences.chinese: 卷一帘细雨，想化身这珠帘随风化为气充盈万物间。

sentences.english: The weathering resistance is strong, and the rock weathering surface often shows obvious uplift.
sentences.chinese: 抗风化能力强，在岩石风化面上常呈现出明显的凸起。

sentences.english: The weathering resistance is strong, and the rock weathering surface often shows obvious uplift.
sentences.chinese: 抗风化能力强，在岩石风化面上常呈现出明显的凸起。

sentences.english: Studies of these minerals show they are hypergene minerals formed from weathering of apatite.
sentences.chinese: 研究认为它们是磷灰石风化作用形成的表生矿物。

sentences.english: The rock has weathered away into soil.
This paper focuses on mineral weathering by silicate bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 研究了硅酸盐细菌对矿物的风化作用。

definition: talus slide/to crumble (of scree slope)/to collapse/landslide
to cleanse/to scrub/to scour/to wash down/to erode/to wash away
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
